about.label: About Us
about.headline: Marasi Delivery Smarter, Faster, Closer Logistics
about.description: At Marasi Logistics Delivery, we bring you comprehensive expertise in transportation and distribution, powered by a qualified team and advanced technology to ensure fast and accurate deliveries.

services_section.label: Services
services_section.heading: Our Service For You
services_section.item_1_desc: Hot, fresh, and on-time deliveries for restaurants and catering services. Ensuring quality and customer satisfaction every step of the way.
services_section.item_2_desc: Secure and efficient parcel delivery across Saudi Arabia. Fast, reliable, and tailored for both individuals and businesses.
services_section.item_3_desc: Safe transport for temperature-sensitive goods like food and medicine. Maintaining freshness and quality with advanced cooling systems.
services_section.item_4_desc: Professional storage and inventory tracking for maximum efficiency.

choose_us.label: Why Choose Us
choose_us.heading: Why Choose Marasi?
choose_us.description: At Marasi Delivery Services, we deliver reliable, customer-focused logistics backed by quality, innovation, and nationwide coverage.
choose_us.feature_1_desc: Reliable, high-quality service with continuous performance evaluation.
choose_us.feature_2_desc: Strategic partnerships with leading platforms like HungerStation, Jahez, and Chefz
choose_us.feature_3_desc: 24/7 customer support to ensure smooth operations at all times.
choose_us.feature_4_desc: Nationwide coverage across all regions of Saudi Arabia

testimonials.label: Safe Transportation & Logistics

testimonials.slide_2_content: Professional and reliable service — punctual and efficient. Their team handled our logistics with care and attention to detail.
testimonials.slide_3_content: Exceptional logistics support and strong communication. We saw clear improvements in delivery times and customer satisfaction.

cta.label: Let’s Talk
cta.heading: Let’s Talk You Need Any Help?

intro.food: We provide fast food delivery while maintaining temperature and quality, catering to your daily needs and special occasions, with real-time order tracking and multiple payment options.
intro.pakege: Our parcel delivery service ensures your shipment arrives quickly and safely, with real-time notifications, tracking, and optional insurance for valuable parcels.
intro.track: Our refrigerated transport system maintains the ideal temperature for sensitive goods such as food and medical supplies, with live tracking and real-time notifications throughout the journey.
intro.wearhouse: We offer comprehensive warehouse and inventory management, from secure storage to fast order preparation and shipping, with smart solutions to reduce costs and speed up operations.
intro.partner: We establish long-term contractual partnerships with companies, providing customized logistics solutions that ensure reliable service and flexibility to meet all partner needs.

hero.label: Marasi Delivery
hero.heading: We provide innovative and efficient logistics solutions
hero.lead: Our vision is to build a faster and smarter logistics future. We believe that customer satisfaction is the key to our success, which is why we continuously work on developing our services to meet the changing market needs, ensuring real value that strengthens our partners’ trust and helps them grow and expand globally.

cookie_consent.title: We use cookies
cookie_consent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.
cookie_consent.necessary_cookies_description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly.
cookie_consent.analytics_cookies_description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Let's get you back on track.

500.title: Server Error
500.description: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Our team has been notified and is working to resolve the issue.

section_1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section_1.description: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you:
items: Communicate with us via email or phone

section_2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section_2.description: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide and improve our logistics services
Respond to your inquiries and requests
Send you updates about our services

section_3.title: 3. Information Sharing
section_3.description: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy or as required by law.

section_4.title: 4. Data Security
section_4.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

section_5.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Object to processing of your data

section_6.title: 6. Cookies
section_6.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

section_7.title: 7. Contact Us
section_7.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

section_1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section_1.description: By accessing and using MARASSI logistics services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

section_2.title: 2. Service Description
section_2.description: MARASSI provides comprehensive logistics and transportation services including:

section_3.title: 3. User Responsibilities
items: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
Not use our services for illegal activities

section_4.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
section_4.description: MARASSI shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of our services.

section_5.title: 5. Service Availability
section_5.description: We strive to maintain service availability but do not guarantee uninterrupted access. Services may be temporarily unavailable due to maintenance or technical issues.

section_6.title: 6. Pricing and Payment
section_6.description: Service pricing is subject to change. Payment terms will be clearly communicated before service commencement. All fees are non-refundable unless otherwise specified.

section_7.title: 7. Termination
section_7.description: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our services immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that violates these Terms of Service.
